Public Member Functions

 SQLiteStorage ()
 get ($key)
 set ($key, $val, $immutable=false)

Detailed Description

A LocalStorage implementation using SQLite

Mostly a sample of what an alternative might look like. Performance is decidedly subpar. Not recommended for production use.

Member Function Documentation

SQLiteStorage::get ( $  key  ) 

Get the value stored with the given key

Parameters:
$key A unique key string
Returns:
The value (mixed)
The value can be any PHP type that the underlying mechanism can store.

If the key is not found, the return value will be an empty string.

Reimplemented from LocalStorage.

The value can be any PHP type that the underlying mechanism can store.
